TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DefaultAuthenticationModule extends System.Object implements class System.Web.IHttpModule
Public NotInheritable Class DefaultAuthenticationModule Implements IHttpModule
public ref class DefaultAuthenticationModule sealed : System::Web::IHttpModule

summary.span: 確定內容中有驗證 (Authentication) 物件。

span.span: Ensures that an authentication object is present in the context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可確保屬性的目前執行個體設定為針對每個要求的物件。The ensures that the property of the current instance is set to an object for each request. 會檢查屬性之後事件，以及之前事件。The examines the property after the event and before the event. 如果屬性是`null`，則設定屬性設不包含任何使用者資訊的物件。If the property is `null`, the sets the property to a object that contains no user information. 如果設定的驗證模組屬性為 401，將轉譯的拒絕存取時的錯誤頁面。If the authentication module sets the property to 401, the will render an access-denied error page. 如果值屬性設定為值大於 200，物件會結束要求。If the value of the property is set to a value greater than 200, the object will end the request. 在此情況下，只有 HTTP 模組的訂閱目前要求完成之前會呼叫事件。In that case, only HTTP modules that subscribe to the event are called prior to the completion of the current request. 公開事件。The exposes an event. 您可以使用這個事件來提供自訂物件屬性與目前執行個體。You can use this event to provide a custom object for the property of the current instance. 藉由指定事件，名為存取事件**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中。The event is accessed by specifying an event named **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the application's Global.asax file. ## Examples 下列範例會使用**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件，以測試是否屬性與目前執行個體是`null`。The following example uses the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to test whether the property of the current instance is `null`. 如果屬性是`null`，則範例集屬性與目前執行個體物件位置的物件是與值為"default"。If the property is `null`, then the sample sets the property of the current instance to a object where the of the object is a with a value of "default." > [!NOTE] > **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**就會引發事件之前事件。The **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised before the event. 如此一來，如果您設定屬性與目前執行個體的自訂身分識別，它可能會影響您的應用程式的行為。As a result, if you set the property of the current instance to a custom identity, it can affect the behavior of your application. 例如，如果您使用類別，並指定``中[授權](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/8d82143t(v%3dvs.100))組態區段，以便確保只有經過驗證的使用者可以存取您的網站，此範例會造成[拒絕](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/8aeskccd(v%3dvs.100))項目受到忽略，因為使用者都會有名稱，也就是"default"。For example, if you are using the class and you specify `` in the [authorization](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/8d82143t(v%3dvs.100)) configuration section to ensure that only authenticated users have access to your site, this sample will cause the [deny](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/8aeskccd(v%3dvs.100)) element to be ignored, as the user will have a name, which is "default." 相反地，您會指定``以確保只有已驗證的使用者可以存取您的網站。Instead, you would specify `` to ensure that only authenticated users can access your site. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.DefaultAuthenticationModule/VB/global.asax#1)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式不是從應用程式程式碼呼叫。This constructor is not intended to be called from application code. ASP.NET 會呼叫這個建構函式建立的執行個體類別。ASP.NET calls this constructor to create an instance of the class. 在呼叫建構函式之後, 它會呼叫方法來初始化新物件。After calling the constructor, it calls the method to initialize the new object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Authenticate As DefaultAuthenticationEventHandler

summary.span: 在要求已經驗證之後發生。

span.span: Occurs after the request has been authenticated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之後，就會引發事件事件。The event is raised after the event. 它用來確保屬性的目前執行個體填入物件。It is used to ensure that the property of the current instance is populated with an object. 您可以存取事件的類別，藉由指定名為副程式**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中。You can access the event of the class by specifying a subroutine named **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the application's Global.asax file. 您可以使用的屬性物件中**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件設定屬性與目前執行個體，以自訂物件。You can use the property of the object in the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current instance to a custom object. 如果您未指定的值屬性，設定屬性執行個體不包含任何使用者資訊的物件。If you do not specify a value for the property, the sets the property of the instance to a object that contains no user information. **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**之後，就會引發事件事件，以及之前事件。The **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised after the event and before the event. 如果您有以拒絕或允許存取您的應用程式的使用者名稱而定的區段，修改屬性與目前執行個體可能會影響您的應用程式的行為。If you have an section that depends on the user name to deny or allow access to your application, modifying the property of the current instance can affect the behavior of your application. 務必讓您設定期間的使用者名稱**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件會被視為，當您指定[授權](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/8d82143t(v%3dvs.100))組態中的區段。Be sure that the user name you set during the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is considered when you specify the [authorization](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/8d82143t(v%3dvs.100)) section in your configuration. > [!NOTE] > 如果 Web 應用程式在整合模式中，在 IIS 7.0 中執行事件的就不會引發。If the Web application is running in IIS 7.0 in Integrated mode, the event of the is not raised. 如果`mode`的屬性[authentication](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/532aee0e(v%3dvs.100))組態項目設為 [無]，應用程式訂閱事件，就會引發錯誤。If the `mode` attribute of the [authentication](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/532aee0e(v%3dvs.100)) configuration element is set to "None" and the application subscribes to the event, a error is raised. 在此案例中，若要接收驗證通知，訂閱事件的執行個體。In this scenario, to receive authentication notification, subscribe to the event of the instance. 如需在整合模式的相容性問題的詳細資訊，請參閱[從 IIS 6.0 的 ASP.NET 應用程式移轉至 IIS 7.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76f9cc78-f978-4837-b1c8-51d642ec4847)。For more information about compatibility issues in Integrated mode, see [Moving an ASP.NET Application from IIS 6.0 to IIS 7.0](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/76f9cc78-f978-4837-b1c8-51d642ec4847). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用**DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件，以測試是否屬性與目前執行個體是`null`。The following code example uses the **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to test whether the property of the current instance is `null`. 如果屬性是`null`，則範例集屬性與目前執行個體物件位置的物件是與值為"default"。If the property is `null`, then the sample sets the property of the current instance to a object where the of the object is a with a value of "default." > [!NOTE] > **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**就會引發事件之前事件。The **DefaultAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is raised before the event. 如此一來，如果您設定屬性與目前執行個體的自訂身分識別，它可能會影響您的應用程式的行為。As a result, if you set the property of the current instance to a custom identity, it can affect the behavior of your application. 例如，如果您使用類別，並指定``中[授權](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/8d82143t(v%3dvs.100))組態區段，以便確保只有經過驗證的使用者可以存取您的網站，此範例會造成[拒絕](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/8aeskccd(v%3dvs.100))項目受到忽略，因為使用者都會有名稱，也就是"default"。For example, if you are using the class and you specify `` in the [authorization](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/8d82143t(v%3dvs.100)) configuration section to ensure that only authenticated users have access to your site, this sample will cause the [deny](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/8aeskccd(v%3dvs.100)) element to be ignored, as the user will have a name, which is "default." 相反地，您會指定``以確保只有已驗證的使用者可以存取您的網站。Instead, you would specify `` to ensure that only authenticated users can access your site. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法不是從應用程式程式碼呼叫。This method is not intended to be called from application code. 方法可確保包含在事件的處理。The method ensures that the is included in the processing of events.
